Events.name: Striker's Edge
Events.content: Experience the thrill of solving logic puzzles, playing chess with a litttle twist and pitching ideas.
Events.round1: Nonogram is a picture logic puzzle. To disclose a concealed picture, cells in a grid must be coloured or left blank according to the alphabet on the side of the grid, just like mine sweeper. In this puzzle type, an alphabet is a form of discrete tomography that measures how many unbroken lines of filled-in squares are in any given row or column. After all the alphabet or letters are recognized, it will lead to a location on the campus, which participants must find out. It will be a time-based task.
Events.round2: In this game, participants must take the horse piece from start to finish point given on the board.
Events.round3: The horse will cover 2.5 blocks in one step. While taking our horse from start to finish point, they must take the minimum number of steps in doing so. They must drop out the other colour board pieces in which the King piece is a must and collect the maximum number of points in doing so.
Events.round4: Players will be provided with a newsletter containing different articles. Each article will have problem statements hidden in them. Players will find hidden problem statements and pitch any sort of detailed solution. The best idea solution will be the winner.

Events.name: Ohm's Odyssey
Events.content: Experience the thrill of dart games, riddle solving and traditional snake & ladder games with a twist of electronics integrated into it.
Events.round1: Riddle Coding Teams of two participants will be assigned, and they will each receive four distinct puzzles to solve. Each team will receive a unique set of puzzles, with a colour as the solution. They'll get three more riddles to decode the sequence. The teams must figure out all four puzzles to receive a colour code. According to the resistor color coding they have to give the value of the resistor.
Events.round2: Teams of four participants will be divided, and each team will be given a circuit to figure out how much resistance to add so that the LED does not ignite. Then, each team will be given a total of 16 chances—4 for each player—to throw a dart onto a coloured dartboard and cross the resistance value's lower limit.

Events.name: Boolean Blitz
Events.content: Enjoy playing mind games with a blend of Electronics. Use basic knowledge of circuits to win against your opponents.
Events.round1: There is a given MIMO digital circuit with a blank space for a circuit component which will be a logic gate. The circuit will be of two phases first will convert character to ASCII code and second will consist of a logic gate with one blank gate. Player will feed in his alphabets in the ASCII converter. The objective of the game is to choose the right logic gate which leads to max output in the given digital circuit.
Events.round2: There will be a 4×4 Grid and every box will be named from 1 to 16. Every participant has to start from box 1. Each box will contain a digital circuit (consisting of logic gates) with 2 inputs and unique solution of output 1. Participants have to apply the input which gives 1 as output. After solving 16 boxes, according to the time taken and shortcut trick used, the result will be declared.

Workshops.name: Neural Networks
Workshops.content: Neural networks solve tasks like image recognition and language processing, emerging as powerful tools.
Workshops.round1: Team Vibhav invites you to an exciting workshop on the futuristic technology of Neuralink. Join us for an engaging session where we will explore the brain-computer interface technology. In this workshop, you will learn about the basics of Neuralink, including its potential applications and the science behind it. You will also witness practical demonstrations of the technology, discuss the ethical and social implications, and explore the future possibilities of Neuralink.
Workshops.round2: Whether you're an up to date person or just someone curious about the latest technology, this workshop is perfect for you. Don't miss this opportunity to learn about one of the most groundbreaking and revolutionary technologies of our time. Join us to enjoy the joy of learning.

Workshops.name: Simulink
Workshops.content: This workshop covers Simulink, a graphical tool for dynamic system modeling, including control and signal processing applications.
Workshops.round1: Team Vibhav is delighted to offer a workshop on Simulink, an essential tool for modeling, simulating, and analyzing dynamic systems. The workshop will cover a wide range of topics, including creating models, adding blocks, running simulations, and exploring Simulink's advanced features such as Model Explorer, Signal Editor, and Simulation Data Inspector.
Workshops.round2: Our experienced professionals will conduct the workshop and provide hands-on training, with real-world examples to enhance participants' learning. By the end of this workshop, participants will have a strong foundation in Simulink and be able to apply their knowledge to diverse engineering applications, making it a must-attend event for engineering enthusiasts.
Workshops.round3: Team Vibhav awaits for your participation. Follow us for more updates ….

Workshops.name: Verilog
Workshops.content: The session covers FPGA, ASIC, and embedded systems language principles, enabling Verilog design creation and testing.
Workshops.round1: Team Vibhav is thrilled to announce an upcoming workshop on Verilog, a hardware description language used to design digital circuits. This workshop is ideal for both beginners and experienced Verilog users who are interested in learning more about digital circuit design and improving their skills.
Workshops.round2: In this workshop, participants will have the opportunity to gain hands-on experience in writing and simulating Verilog code for various digital circuits. The workshop will cover the fundamentals of Verilog syntax, including data types, module instantiation, behavioral modeling, and testbench creation. Participants will also learn about timing and power analysis of digital circuits using Verilog simulation tools.
Workshops.round3: Join us at this exciting workshop to expand your knowledge of Verilog and become a more confident digital circuit designer. We look forward to seeing you there!

Events.name: Pahal
Events.content: This is a Event in ehich the locals are given information about meritious goverment schemes for their upliftment.
Events.round1: Team Vibhav achieved remarkable success in organising PAHAL, an awareness campaign on March 15, at barot village, our goal is not only to inform but to inspire.
Events.round2: By spreading awareness about 'PM VISHWAKARMA YOJANA' in Barot, which aims to empower skilled workers by providing financial assistance for toolkits. Himachal Pradesh government launched these schemes to uplift its skilled and unskilled workforce and contribute to the state's economic growth and prosperity.
Events.round3: Overall, PAHAL was a meritorious effort in upliftment of lives of people and spreading awareness. The campaign was a great example of how technology and government schemes can be used to benefit and bring about changes.
Events.round4: 2Overall, PAHAL was a meritorious effort in upliftment of lives of people and spreading awareness. The campaign was a great example of how technology and government schemes can be used to benefit and bring about changes.
Events.round5: 3Overall, PAHAL was a meritorious effort in upliftment of lives of people and spreading awareness. The campaign was a great example of how technology and government schemes can be used to benefit and bring about changes.
Events.round6: 4Overall, PAHAL was a meritorious effort in upliftment of lives of people and spreading awareness. The campaign was a great example of how technology and government schemes can be used to benefit and bring about changes.

Events.name: Prerak
Events.content: Reflecting on a day filled with inspiration and hope at Government Senior Secondary Girls School, Hamirpur,
Events.round1: Witnessing the spark of curiosity in young minds as we shared the wonders of engineering and technical fields was truly uplifting. Let's continue to sow seeds of empowerment and nurture dreams, knowing that each small step today shapes a brighter tomorrow!
Events.round2: Overall, the event organized by Team Vibhav proved to be a resounding success, leaving a lasting impact on the students of the local girl's school in Hamirpur. By demystifying the world of engineering and empowering young minds with knowledge and inspiration, Team Vibhav has undoubtedly planted the seeds for a future generation of innovative engineers.
Events.round3: Overall, the event organized by Team Vibhav proved to be a resounding success, leaving a lasting impact on the students of the local girl's school in Hamirpur. By demystifying the world of engineering and empowering young minds with knowledge and inspiration, Team Vibhav has undoubtedly planted the seeds for a future generation of innovative engineers.

Workshops.name: Aavardhan
Workshops.content: Anytime is a Good time to start a Company. Driven by passion and perseverance, startups have the power to disrupt industries and shape the future.
Workshops.round1: Team Vibhav, in collaboration with the Incubation Centre, NIT Hamirpur under CM Startup Project of Himachal Pradesh, proudly presents 'आवर्धनः' From Spark to Unicorn Brilliance, a dynamic guest lecture aimed at inspiring and educating aspiring entrepreneurs and innovators.We are thrilled to welcome Dr. Puran Singh, Associate Professor at IIT Mandi and Director of Incubation Centre, IIT Mandi as our esteemed guest lecturer.
Workshops.round2: He has a plenty of experience and expertise in entrepreneurship and innovation. Participants will have the opportunities to ask questions, share thoughts, through this interactive session.
Workshops.round3: Join us for an inspiring session that could spark your entrepreneurial journey.

Workshops.name: Cloud Computing
Workshops.content: This workshop offers practical training and insights into utilizing remote servers to store, manage, and process data and applications over the internet.
Workshops.round1: Embark on a journey into the realm of cloud computing with our upcoming workshop. Whether you're just starting out or a seasoned cloud aficionado, this workshop is designed to cater to individuals eager to explore the intricacies of cloud technology and elevate their expertise.Throughout the workshop, participants will gain valuable insights into essential cloud service models including laaS, PaaS, and SaaS.
Workshops.round2: Dive into hands-on exercises that demystify the workings of leading cloud providers such as Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud Platform.Join us for an immersive experience that transcends theoretical knowledge, empowering you with the practical skills required to leverage the potential of cloud computing effectively.
Workshops.round3: We eagerly anticipate your active involvement in this dynamic cloud computing workshop!

Workshops.name: System on Chip
Workshops.content: This workshop provides hands-on learning and expertise in developing integrated circuits that incorporate all necessary components of electronic system onto a single chip.
Workshops.round1: Ready to dive deep into the revolutionary world of System on Chip (SoC) technology? Join us for an electrifying workshop where we unravel the mysteries behind SoC architecture and its groundbreaking applications.
Workshops.round2: Whether you're an aspiring engineer, a seasoned developer, or just a tech enthusiast hungry for knowledge, this workshop promises to fuel your curiosity and expand your skill set.
Workshops.round3: Don't miss out on this opportunity to connect with fellow tech aficionados and dive into the world of SoC innovation! Let's unlock the potential of SoC together!
